name: The Polysea
description:
Welcome to the Polysea!

Mini VR game developed entirely by Pilar Aranda. In the Polysea the player
becomes the god Poseidon, you will have to save the famous sailor Jason
and it's crew from the Kraken by guiding throwing stars into the sky
that will lead them to safe land. Available for HTC Vive.


Credits:

Voice: Lilley F.

Sounds: Andy Gardner, Aiwha, GkillHour, Benjamin Harvey, Camposonoro CC Attribution.
Free Assets: Thomas de Rivaz, and Rajat Verma CC Attribution.
